name: Free Online Bulk QR Code Generator - ATools
description: Free online bulk QR code generator. Generate many QR PNGs and download as a ZIP. Runs locally.
seoDescription: Free online bulk QR code generator. Paste multiple lines (optionally with labels) to generate QR code PNG images and download them as a ZIP. Everything runs locally in your browser with zero uploads for privacy.

ui.hint: Generate many QR codes at once and download as a ZIP (local only).
ui.inputHint: Format: text, or label<TAB>text, or label,text
